item.title: Continuity Command (Opening Ritual)
item.description:
Continuity Command (Opening Ritual)

Summary: Opening ritual for any new AI chat: establish roles, context, and continuity anchors so the session is immediately operational.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 5

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
